snippet.title: The Longest Walk - Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
This is a full playthrough of The Longest Walk without additional commentary. The Longest Walk is a documentary walking-simulator game about my father's experience of living with depression. This work was created as part of a series of PhD prototypes at Abertay University.

The game can be downloaded for free at:
https://thesandymancan.itch.io/the-longest-walk

- Trigger Warning -

The following game discusses themes of depression and suicidal intent which some players may find distressing. If you or a loved one are feeling depressed or experiencing suicidal thoughts please contact Samaritans.org.

➡️ More from Alexander Tarvet
https://thesandymancan.itch.io
https://www.alexanderjamestarvet.com
https://www.twitter.com/alexandertarvet
